de.slothsoft.charts.swt

Class SwtGraphicContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.slothsoft.charts.swt.SwtGraphicContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.slothsoft.charts.GraphicContext

    public class SwtGraphicContext
extends Object
implements de.slothsoft.charts.GraphicContext
    A GraphicContext implementation using the SWT GC to draw on whatever you like.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Stef Schulz

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes of the operating system resources associated with this resource. Applications must dispose of all resources which they allocate. This method does nothing if the resource is already disposed.
